src:
Našli 14-letnega Domna, skril se je v zapuščeni objekt
Doma je na območju Šentjurja. 
05 Nov 2019, 06:17 by Ma. M.
ŠENTJUR – Policija je v ponedelje popoldan poslala obvestilo, da je pogrešan 14-letni Domen Gradišnik iz Dobriše vasi na območju PP Šentjur.  Nazadnje so ga videli okoli 13. ure v bližini Osnovne šole Franja Malgaja v Šentjurju. V torek zjutraj so iskanje preklicali, saj da so domna našli. »S pomočjo informacij  občana smo ga našli v zapuščenem objektu v Šentjurju,« so sporočili s PU Celje.
text:
Finding 14-year-old Domno, he hid in an abandoned facility
He is at home in the Šentjur area.
05 Nov 2019, 06:17 by Ma. M.
ŠENTJUR - Police sent a notice Monday afternoon that 14-year-old Domen Gradišnik from Dobriša vas in the Šentjur PP area was missing. He was last seen around 1pm near Francis Malgai Primary School in Sentjur. On Tuesday morning, the search was canceled because they found the home. "With the help of information from a citizen, we found him in an abandoned facility in Šentjur," said the Celje Police Directorate.
